Body:
from bigdl.nn.layer import Linear
rng = RNG()
rng.set_seed(100)
input = [rng.uniform(0.0, 0.1, [2]), rng.uniform(0.0, 0.1, [2]) + 0.2]
grad_output = [rng.uniform(0.0, 0.1, [3]), rng.uniform(0.0, 0.1, [3]) + 0.2]
linear1 = Linear(2, 3)
linear2 = Linear(2, 3)
module = ParallelTable()
module.add(linear1)
module.add(linear2)
module.forward(input)
module.backward(input, grad_output)
